CustomField.description: The messages header that you email servie inserts when it redirects or forwards a message
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The messages header that you email servie inserts when it redirects or forwards a message. fore example MS Outlook uses :- x-ms-exchange-parent-message-id: Google uses :- Message-Id: ie it forwards a messages it does not give it a new ID but still declare this header here
CustomField.label: Message header to find
